actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-509, by Mr. Frost.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4301 with 2 hours of general debate. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Armed Services now printed in the bill. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 159.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 369 - 49 (Roll no. 178).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4301) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1995 for military activities of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel strengths for fiscal year 1995, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4301 (National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1995).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4301) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1995 for military activities of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel strengths for fiscal year 1995, and for other purposes.
